        "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_iskandar_gordius_wheel"     "<font color='#58ACFA'>神威车轮</font>"
        "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_iskandar_gordius_wheel_Description" "伊斯坎达尔在持续时间内使用 <font color='#FFFF28'>神威车轮</font>. \n<font color='#FFFF28'>神威车轮</font>:伊斯坎达尔乘上战车，获得额外护甲和魔法抗性，并每秒增加移动速度。额外护甲和魔抗会随时间减少. \n 持续对周围敌人造成伤害，距离越近伤害越高. \n不能在使用神威车轮时施放 <font color='#58ACFA'>王之军势</font> . \n\n<font color='#9FFFCC'>可选属性升级: 雷神之怒</font>."

        "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_iskandar_army_of_the_king"     "<font color='#58ACFA'>王之军势</font>"
        "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_iskandar_army_of_the_king_Description" "短暂延迟后，范围内的所有敌人将被传送到伊斯坎达尔的固有结界. \n伊斯坎达尔召唤 <font color='#99FF33'>攸美尼斯</font> 和他的军队, <font color='#99FF33'>步兵</font> 和 <font color='#99FF33'>弓箭手</font>. \n 伊斯坎达尔获得新技能. \n <font color='#58ACFA'>召唤赫费斯提翁</font>: 召唤 <font color='#99FF33'>赫费斯提翁</font> 和 <font color='#99FF33'>骑兵</font>. \n <font color='#58ACFA'>箭雨</font>: 使用箭雨攻击目标区域，造成伤害并 <font color='#FF3399'>缠绕</font> 敌人. \n 每升一级增加士兵的血量和攻击力. \n 王之军势里的士兵不能太少. \n 王之军势存在时, <font color='#58ACFA'>神威车轮</font> 不能使用. \n\n<font color='#9FFFCC'>可选属性升级: 超越时间的羁绊</font>. \n 伊斯坎达尔在施法时将被 <font color='#FF3399'>眩晕</font> 和 <font color='#FF3399'>禁咒</font>."
        "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_iskandar_army_of_the_king_Lore"	"Many spirits. One dream."
        "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_iskandar_army_of_the_king_cast_delay"	"施法延迟:"

		"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_iskandar_army_of_the_king_Note3"		"In case <font color='#58ACFA'>Army of the King</font> is overlapping with another Reality Marble, <font color='#58ACFA'>Unlimited Blade Works</font>, the battlefield takes place in the first Marble cast. When that Marble is broken, both Marbles cease to sustain."

		"DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_iskandar_army_of_the_king_upgrade"     "<font color='#9FFFCC'>王之军势</font>"

        "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_gawain_sun_of_galatine_Description"		"<font color='#58ACFA'>持续施法</font>: 高文创造一个人造太阳. 对周围所有敌人施加 <font color='#FF3399'>轮转的太阳</font> 状态. \n 无论施法中段或成功，太阳都会爆炸，对根据施法时间对附近敌人造成伤害并 <font color='#FF3399'>眩晕</font> . \n<font color='#FF3399'>轮转的太阳</font>: 每秒降低移动速度并造成伤害. \n 人造太阳持续到施法结束. \n\n<font color='#9FFFCC'>可选属性升级: 柏希雷克腰带 和 太阳骑士</font>."

        "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_tamamo_amaterasu"     				"<font color='#58ACFA'>天照大神的八重祝福</font>"
        "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_tamamo_amaterasu_Description" 		"玉藻前在周围创建一个结界. \n 所有盟友在离开前都会获得 <font color='#FFFF28'>天照大神的祝福</font>. \n<font color='#FFFF28'>天照大神的祝福</font>: 提高法力回复、移动速度和攻击速度，施法时将恢复生命值和法力. \n\n<font color='#9FFFCC'>可选属性升级: 领土创造</font>. \n 如果玉藻前离开，区域就会消失."

        "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_lishuwen_raging_dragon_strike"		"<font color='#FF04EF'>连击技能: 狂龙之击</font>"
        "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_lishuwen_raging_dragon_strike_Description"	"<font color='#FF04EF'>技能要求 : 25 全属性</font>\n<font color='#FF04EF'>施放顺序 : 5秒内W - D -> E -> E -> E</font>\n李书文连续使用三个绝招.\n<font color='#58ACFA'>第一式:</font> 冲向目标，造成魔法伤害并使所有敌人<font color='#FF3399'>减速</font>.\n<font color='#58ACFA'>第二式:</font> 踩踏地面，对所有敌人造成物理伤害和<font color='#FF3399'>眩晕</font>. \n<font color='#58ACFA'>第三式:</font> 李书文 <font color='#FF3399'>击飞</font> 所有敌人并造成混合伤害.\n 如果李书文没有打出第三式，技能冷却时间降低. \n李书文使用第三式时 <font color='#FFFF28'>无敌</font> 且 <font color='#FFFF28'>无法选中</font>."

        "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_lishuwen_raging_dragon_strike_2_Description"	"<font color='#FF04EF'>Combo Requirement : 25 all stats</font>\n<font color='#FF04EF'>Combo Sequence : W - D -> E -> E -> E in 5 seconds</font>\n Li Shuwen chains together 3 devastating moves.\n<font color='#58ACFA'>1st:</font> Dashes to target, striking all enemies in his path %first_strike_damage% magic damage and <font color='#FF3399'>slowing</font> them by %first_strike_slow%% for %first_strike_slow_duration% seconds.\n<font color='#58ACFA'>2nd:</font> Stomps the ground, dealing %second_strike_damage% physical damage to enemies within %second_strike_radius% area and <font color='#FF3399'>stunning</font> them for %second_strike_stun_duration% seconds. \n<font color='#58ACFA'>3rd:</font> Li Shuwen <font color='#FF3399'>knocks up</font> all nearby enemies to the air for %third_strike_knockup_duration% seconds and striking them up to %third_strike_aerial_hit_count% times, divided evenly, dealing damage %third_strike_aerial_damage% plus %third_strike_bonus_damage%%% of Li Shuwen's attack damage as composite damage.\nIf Li Shuwen fails to activate the 3rd strike, the cooldown of this ability is reduced to %third_strike_failure_cdr%%%."

        "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_combo_la_pucelle"	"<font color='#FFFFFF'>La Pucelle</font> "
        "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_combo_la_pucelle_Description"	"<font color='#58ACFA'>Combo Requirement : 25 all stats</font>\n<font color='#58ACFA'>Combo Sequence : None(triggered by death)</font>\nUpon death, Jeanne ascends to a spirit form, unable to cast spells and Command Seals but becoming invulnerable, gaining <font color='#ff9900'>Saint</font> buff and gaining bonus movement and attack speed. While in spirit form, divine flame spreads from her to set nearby enemies ablaze, dealing magic damage based on enemy's current health.\n\nWhen Jeanne faces eventual death, she counts as alive at the round timeout when comparing the number of survivors between two teams. La Pucelle does not activate if Ruler is executed or is the last standing hero."
        "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_combo_la_pucelle_delay"		"ASCENSION DELAY:"
        "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_jeanne_combo_la_pucelle_duration"		"SPIRIT FORM DURATION:"

		"DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_mordred_mmb_lightning" "<font color='#FF04EF'>连击技能: 最大魔力放出 - 雷电</font>"
		"DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_mordred_mmb_lightning_Description" "<font color='#FF04EF'>技能释放需求 : 25 全属性</font>\n<font color='#FF04EF'>技能顺序 : 4秒内Q - D -> R </font> \n 莫德雷德冲向目标位置, 随机在周围释放雷电并开始充能. \n 引导结束后, 莫德雷德释放出大量魔力, 根据敌人离她的距离造成伤害. \n 敌人在%inner_range%距离受到 %high%%% 伤害. 敌人在%medium_range%距离受到 %moderate%%% 伤害. 敌人在 %blast_radius%距离受到 %low%%% 伤害. \n 雷电在莫德雷德死亡后中断, 但是法力爆发依然会施放, 并根据引导时间造成伤害. \n 冲刺基础伤害基于 <font color='#58ACFA'>愤怒冲击</font>. \n\n<font color='#9FFFCC'>可选属性升级: 雷电过载</font>. \n 在释放技能时<font color='#FF3399'>眩晕</font> 和<font color='#FF3399'>禁咒</font>."
		"DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_mordred_mmb_lightning_Note0" "莫德雷德在施法期间为<font color='#FF3399'>晕眩</font> 状态并为<font color='#FF3399'>破除</font>状态，断绝与御主之连结."

        <font color='#9FFFCC'>可升级属性: 魔力放出（宝石）</font>."

        <font color='#58ACFA'>山脉震撼明星之薪</font>: 伊丝塔不再 <font color='#58ACFA'>充能</font> 并跳到空中向目标区域发射巨型箭矢, 每消耗一颗 <font color='#FFFF28'>宝石</font> 可发射 %RArrow% 额外的魔法箭. 额外的魔法箭会在目标区域内的随机位置, 造成 %RArrowDamage% 伤害 %RArrowAoe% 范围. 最多 %RGem% <font color='#FFFF28'>宝石</font>.

        <font color='#FF04EF'>技能顺序: 4秒内 Q-D->R .</font> 
        伊丝塔穿越传送门到地图中心持续 %delay_before_tele% 秒, 传送后伊丝塔获得所有可见敌方视野同时启用 <font color='#58ACFA'>艾比夫山粉碎者 - 山脈震撼明星之薪射击</font> 持续 %reveal% 秒.
        <font color='#58ACFA'>艾比夫山粉碎者 - 山脈震撼明星之薪射击</font>: 选择目标区域. 如果这个技能限时内没有使用, 伊丝塔会随机瞄准敌方英雄的位置.
        当完成充能 %cast% 秒, 伊丝塔将金星的力量射向目标区域, 引发巨大爆炸并造成伤害基于伊丝塔 <font color='#FFFF28'>宝石</font>.
        受影响的区域将燃烧并每秒造成少量伤害.   
        伊丝塔将会 <font color='#FF3399'>暈眩</font> 直到她进入传送门并且变为 <font color='#FFFF28'>无敌</font> 和 <font color='#FFFF28'>不可选取</font> 同时漂浮在天空上.
		伊丝塔完成该技能后将会传送回原始位置.
		<font color='#FF04EF'>艾比夫山粉碎者 - 山脉震撼明星之薪</font> 无法在结界内使用并且 <font color='#58ACFA'>艾比夫山粉碎者 - 山脉震撼明星之薪射击</font> 不能射击结界内."

		"DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_atalanta_alter_curse"	"<font color='#FFFFFF'>卡吕冬野猪的诅咒</font>"
		"DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_atalanta_alter_curse_Description"	"<font color='#58ACFA'>被动</font>: 攻击或使用技能 (<font color='#58ACFA'>咆哮, 越过阿卡迪亚, 暗天之弓 - 箭雨</font> 或者 <font color='#FF04EF'>暗天蚀射</font>) 阿塔兰塔会对敌人施加 <font color='#FF3399'>卡吕冬野猪的诅咒</font> 层数 %curse_duration% 秒. 
		<font color='#58ACFA'>主动</font>: 引爆 %active_search% 范围的敌人身上所有诅咒. 阿塔兰塔会吸收所有诅咒并且转化成 <font color='#FFFF28'>诅咒能量</font> 层数. 
		<font color='#FF3399'>卡吕冬野猪的诅咒</font>: 当诅咒达到 %curse_max_stack% 层或时间耗尽时,诅咒将会爆炸并且对目标造成魔法伤害. 
		如果阿塔兰塔停留在受诅咒目标 %passive_search% 范围内，并且已有目标视野, 阿塔兰塔将吸收诅咒并获得 <font color='#FFFF28'>诅咒能量</font> 层数. 
		<font color='#FFFF28'>诅咒能量</font>: 当诅咒能量达到 %energy_stack% 层, 阿塔兰塔获得 <font color='#FFFF28'>邪恶野兽</font> 持续 %evil_duration% 秒. 
		<font color='#FFFF28'>邪恶野兽</font>: 阿塔兰塔的攻击造成 %evil_dmg% 额外魔法伤害. 阿塔兰塔的攻击同样会造成 <font color='#FFFFFF'>100%%</font> 溅射伤害和 %evil_splash% 溅射范围. 阿塔兰塔的攻击和技能将对敌人施加 <font color='#FFFFFF'>2</font> 次 <font color='#FF3399'>卡吕冬野猪的诅咒</font> 层数.
		阿塔兰塔无法获得 <font color='#FFFF28'>诅咒能量</font>层数当正在处于 <font color='#FFFF28'>邪恶野兽</font>.
		所有 <font color='#FFFF28'>诅咒能量</font>层数将会重置当阿塔兰塔結束 <font color='#FFFF28'>邪恶野兽</font>
		<font color='#9FFFCC'>可升级属性: 诅咒之月和自我进化</font>.
		诅咒伤害: %curse_dmg% x 层数"

		"DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_atalanta_alter_curse_upgrade_1"	"<font color='#9FFFCC'>卡吕冬野猪的诅咒</font>"
		"DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_atalanta_alter_curse_upgrade_1_Description"	"<font color='#58ACFA'>被动</font>: 攻击或使用技能(<font color='#58ACFA'>咆哮, 越过阿卡迪亚, 暗天之弓 - 箭雨</font> 或者 <font color='#FF04EF'>暗天蚀射</font>) 阿塔兰塔会对敌人施加 <font color='#FF3399'>卡吕冬野猪的诅咒</font> 层数 %curse_duration% 秒. 
		<font color='#58ACFA'>主动</font>: 引爆 %active_search% 范围的敌人身上所有诅咒. 阿塔兰塔会吸收所有诅咒并且转化成 <font color='#FFFF28'>诅咒能量</font> 层数. 
		<font color='#FF3399'>卡吕冬野猪的诅咒</font>: 当诅咒达到 %curse_max_stack% 层或时间耗尽时, 诅咒将会爆炸并且对目标造成魔法伤害基于阿塔兰塔的 <font color='#80FF00'>敏捷</font> . 阿塔兰塔能够获得目标视野當目标超过 %vision% 层数.
		如果阿塔兰塔停留在受诅咒目标 %passive_search% 范围内，并且已有目标视野, 阿塔兰塔将吸收诅咒并获得 <font color='#FFFF28'>诅咒能量</font> 层数. 
		<font color='#FFFF28'>诅咒能量</font>: 当诅咒能量达到 %energy_stack% 层, 阿塔兰塔获得 <font color='#FFFF28'>邪恶野兽</font> 持续 %evil_duration% 秒.
		<font color='#FFFF28'>邪恶野兽</font>: 阿塔兰塔的攻击造成 %evil_dmg% 额外魔法伤害. 阿塔兰塔的攻击同样会造成 <font color='#FFFFFF'>100%%</font> 溅射伤害和 %evil_splash% 溅射范围. 阿塔兰塔的攻击和技能将对敌人施加 <font color='#FFFFFF'>2</font> 次 <font color='#FF3399'>卡吕冬野猪的诅咒</font> 层数.
		阿塔兰塔无法获得 <font color='#FFFF28'>诅咒能量</font>层数当正在处于 <font color='#FFFF28'>邪恶野兽</font>.
		所有 <font color='#FFFF28'>诅咒能量</font>层数将会重置当阿塔兰塔結束 <font color='#FFFF28'>邪恶野兽</font>
		<font color='#9FFFCC'>可升级属性: 自我进化</font>.
		诅咒伤害: (%curse_dmg% x <font color='#FF3399'>层数</font>) + (%curse_dmg_agi% x <font color='#80FF00'>敏捷</font>)"

		诅咒伤害: (%curse_dmg% x <font color='#FF3399'>层数</font>) + (%curse_dmg_agi% x <font color='#80FF00'>敏捷</font>)"

		////////////////// BASIC ////////////////////////

		"DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_atalanta_evolution_attribute_Description"	"激活 <font color='#FFB266'>自我进化</font>
		<font color='#58ACFA'>被动</font>: 当阿塔兰塔的攻击和技能击中敌人时, 阿塔兰塔获得 %energy_gain% <font color='#FFFF28'>诅咒能量</font> 层数.
		每次阿塔兰塔获得 <font color='#FFFF28'>诅咒能量</font> 层数, 阿塔兰塔 <font color='#FFFF28'>治疗</font> 她的 %energy_heal%%% 最大生命.
		<font color='#58ACFA'>卡吕冬野猪的诅咒</font>: 增加 <font color='#FFFF28'>邪恶野兽</font> 持续时间 %bonus_evil_dur% 秒.
		<font color='#FFFF28'>邪恶野兽</font>: 阿塔兰塔获得 <font color='#FFFFFF'>1%%</font> 攻击力並基据<font color='#FFFF28'>诅咒能量</font>层数最大可上升至100."

		"DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_atalanta_beast_attribute"				"<font color='#9FFFCC'>属性: 野兽强化</font>"

		当 <font color='#58ACFA'>越过阿卡迪亚</font> 跳跃中, <font color='#58ACFA'>暗天之弓 - 箭雨</font> 的施法时间减少至 %jump_cast% 秒, 法力消耗减少至 %jump_cost% 和箭雨持续时间只有 %jump_duration% 秒, 但箭雨变得可以跟随自己.
		暗天之弓额外伤害: (%r_agi% x <font color='#80FF00'>敏捷</font>) + (%r_stack%%% x <font color='#FF3399'>层数</font>)"

		"DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_master_shard_of_avarice"				"貪婪的碎片"
		"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_master_shard_of_avarice_Description"	"<font color='#FFCE33'>Supportive Type</font> \n 立即获得10,000金币. 并根据层数获得额外效果,层数需要盟友选择叠加. \n 1 层: 开局获得1点御主法力值和300金币. \n 2 层: 开局获得1点御主生命法力值和600金币. \n 3 层: 开局时获得1 点御主法力, 1 点御主生命, 900 黄金和17秒移动速度加成. \n 4 层: 开局时获得2 点御主法力, 1 点御主生命, 1,200 黄金和17秒移动速度加成. 所有从者获得9点生命和魔法恢复. 		//====================================
		// Fate Tips
		//====================================
		"Fate_Tip1"			"<font color='#58ACFA'>Tip : C Scroll</font> is everyone's bread-and-butter item that you should be carrying at all times. Use it to guarantee your skill combo, or help your teammate by interrupting enemy."
		"Fate_Tip2"			"<font color='#58ACFA'>Tip : </font>Work towards gathering 20 all stats in order to acquire <font color='#58ACFA'>Combo</font>, a defining move of hero that can turn the tides of battle. You can level  Stat Bonus of your hero or buy stats with Master's mana  to boost the timing of acquisition."
		"Fate_Tip3"			"<font color='#58ACFA'>Tip : </font>To increase your survivability, consider carrying <font color='#58ACFA'>A Scroll and B Scroll</font> that grant you significant damage mitigation for duration."
		"Fate_Tip4"			"<font color='#58ACFA'>Tip : </font>Using <font color='#58ACFA'>Scout Familiar and Ward Familiar</font> is an excellent way to develop a vision control, allowing your team to plan ahead for enemy moves."
		"Fate_Tip5"			"<font color='#58ACFA'>Tip : </font>You will get a warning ping when enemy Servant's presence is detected within 2500 range around your hero."
		"Fate_Tip6"			"<font color='#58ACFA'>Tip : </font>Master can cast only up to 12 Command Seals per 10 minutes due to limited health, which resets every 10 minutes."
		"Fate_Tip7"			"<font color='#58ACFA'>Tip : </font>Bind your Master to key unit via [CTRL+Number Key] in order to provide quick support to your hero by transfering items or casting Command Seal."
		"Fate_Tip8"			"<font color='#58ACFA'>Tip : </font>Upon dying 7 times, player will be granted a chance to use Shard of Holy Grail that offers diverse array of advantages. Check the details in Master 2."
		"Fate_Tip9"			"<font color='#58ACFA'>Tip : </font>You can check the detail and cooldown of your Combo on Master 2."
		"Fate_Tip10"		"<font color='#58ACFA'>Tip : </font>When you are desperately short on gold, consider using <font color='#58ACFA'>-goldpls</font> command to ask for a financial assistance from your team."
		"Fate_Tip11"		"<font color='#58ACFA'>Tip : </font>A well-timed use of <font color='#58ACFA'>Command Seal</font> can give you decisive advantage over your foes, both defensively and offensively."

        "Fate_LoadTip1"     "C scrolls are your best friend!"
        "Fate_LoadTip2"     "A scroll and B scroll mitigate a lot of magic damage."
        "Fate_LoadTip3"     "You can bind your master to a control group for easier command seal usage."
        "Fate_LoadTip4"     "Your special combo ability unlocks upon gaining 25 strength, agility and intelligence."
        "Fate_LoadTip5"     "Every ten minutes, a blessing of the Holy Grail will replenish your master's health."
        "Fate_LoadTip6"     "You can change camera distance in the options."
        "Fate_LoadTip7"     "Master mana may be spent on either command seals or upgrading your servant."
        "Fate_LoadTip8"     "Press the icon next to your abilities to open the servant upgrade options."

//LORE TIPS (everyone sees these)
		"dota_tip_lore_1" 				"Arthuria Pendragon is the legendary King Arthur, wielder of the holy sword Excalibur."
		"dota_tip_lore_2" 				"Astolfo is the cutest paladin of Charlemagne. Astolfo is a guy."
		"dota_tip_lore_3" 				"Tamamo no Mae and Nero Claudius are rivals at love."
		"dota_tip_lore_4"				"Lancelot's madness originates from his guilt for betraying his king. His sword, Arondight, blackened as a result of his sin."
		"dota_tip_lore_5"				"Gilgamesh is the original owner of every single legendary weapon that has ever existed. They are stored within Gate of Babylon."
		"dota_tip_lore_6"				"Cu Chulainn, the Son of Light, is Ireland's most revered hero. Trained under the legendary martial artist Scathach, he has both unparalled martial prowess as well as knowledge and usage of magic in form of runes."
		"dota_tip_lore_7"				"Karna is the son of the Sun God, Surya. Gifted the golden armor, Kavacha and Kundala, Karna is near invulnerable. Paired with his divine spear Vasavi Shakti, Karna is one of the most deadly servant to exist on the battlefield."
		"dota_tip_lore_8"				"Li Shuwen, also known as \"God Spear Li\", practiced his martial arts to the pinnacle. One strike from his fist is enough to create a circulatory shock, destroying the magic circuit of his foe from within."
		"dota_tip_lore_9"				"Heracles completed the Twelve Labour of Heracles. As a reward, the gods granted him a blessing of immortality. This is represented by his twelve lives."
		"dota_tip_lore_10"				"Jack the Ripper is the amalgamation of the children aborted and abandoned by the many prostitutes who lived in Whitechapel, London."

//UNIVERSAL LOADSCREEN TIPS		(25+ games played)
		"dota_tip_universal_1"				"You can track remaining command seals and mana at the top left of the game screen."
		"dota_tip_universal_2"				"Remain calm. Remember: it's only a game."
		"dota_tip_universal_3"				"You can mute rude players by going to the Scoreboard, accessed using the buttons on the left side of the Top Bar."

		"dota_tip_universal_5"				"Enjoyed playing with someone? send them a friend request!."
		"dota_tip_universal_6"				"You can hold Alt and click on an ability to inform your teammates of that ability's current cooldown status."
		"dota_tip_universal_7"				"You can inform your teammates that an enemy Hero is missing by holding Alt and clicking on that Hero's portrait in the Top Bar."
		"dota_tip_universal_8"				"Always be polite, especially to your teammates. People are less likely to listen to those who are rude." 
		"dota_tip_universal_9"				"Players who abandon a match will be penalized."		
		"dota_tip_universal_10"				"Anyone can buy wards. If your team needs something, don't be afraid to buy it!"

		"dota_tip_universal_12"				"Good luck. Have fun."

		"dota_tip_universal_15"				"Make your voice heard! Visit the Fate Alternate Workshop page and discuss about the game."
		"dota_tip_universal_16"				"Revoke prevents the usage of Command Spells."
		"dota_tip_universal_17"				"Positive reinforcement can go a long way toward victory."

		"dota_tip_universal_23"				"Pure damage can be reduced by damage reduction effects such as Intervention."
		"dota_tip_universal_24"				"You can hold Alt and click on an ability or item to inform your teammates if it is ready, on cooldown, or if you do not have enough mana to use it."
		"dota_tip_universal_25"				"You can still use items while silenced."
		"dota_tip_universal_26"				"Accidentally attacked and revealed from being Invisible? You can set Auto-Attack to Never from the Options."

		"dota_tip_universal_28"				"Holding Alt and clicking on enemy abilities will alert your team to be wary of that enemy's ability."
		"dota_tip_universal_29"				"The game ends when either team reaches 12 wins first on the default setting."
		"dota_tip_universal_30"				"Fate/Alternate is always evolving. New features are added, new Heroes are introduced, and existing Heroes and mechanics may see adjustments. Keep up with the latest changes at the Fate/Alternate blog and wiki!"
		"dota_tip_universal_31"				"Be careful not to make more enemies than the five you are already facing."
		"dota_tip_universal_33"				"If needed, a Color Blind option is available in the settings menu."

		"dota_tip_universal_64"				"Spell Blocks are available on certain heroes and when activated, they allow that hero to avoid targetted abilties."

		"dota_tip_universal_66"				"Physical damage can be reduced by Armor. Magical damage can be reduced by Magic Resistance. Pure damage can only be reduced by certain damage reduction effects."
		"dota_tip_universal_67"				"If you're having trouble against a certain hero, try playing them. You will quickly learn their weaknesses."

		"dota_tip_universal_70"				"The Silenced status prevents a hero from using abilities."
		"dota_tip_universal_71"				"The Disarmed status prevents a hero from attacking."

//BEGINNER LOADSCREEN TIPS		(25 - 150 games played)
		"dota_tip_beginner_1"			"Holding the Alt key and left clicking would issue a ping command, which helps alerting your teammate of something important."
		"dota_tip_beginner_2"			"You can level up your abilities by holding Control and pressing that ability's shortcut key."
		"dota_tip_beginner_3"			"Use Wards to reveal parts of the map and increase your awareness of the enemy team's movements."
		"dota_tip_beginner_4"			"Be sure to make use of Command Spells to bypass cooldowns, restore health or restore mana."
		"dota_tip_beginner_5"			"Sentry Wards reveal nearby invisible units as well as enemy Wards."		
		"dota_tip_beginner_7"			"You can combine two C scrolls into a B scroll, two B scrolls to an A scroll, all the way up to EX."
		"dota_tip_beginner_10"			"Holding shift and clicking on shop items will add them to the Quickbuy."
		"dota_tip_beginner_11"			"Striking the last hit on an enemy hero grants you the most amount of gold reward."
		"dota_tip_beginner_12"			"You can cross the river into enemy territory through 3 paths from the top, middle and bottom of the map."
		"dota_tip_beginner_13"			"The \"Hard Lane\" is the shortest lane on your team's side of the river. For the Dire, this is the bottom lane. For the Radiant, it is the top lane."
		"dota_tip_beginner_14"			"Typically, a team only needs one courier."
		"dota_tip_beginner_15"			"The movement speed bonus for having boots does not stack. No matter how many legs your chosen Hero has, you only need a single set of boots."
		"dota_tip_beginner_16"			"You can view an enemy Hero's inventory and abilities by selecting them."
		"dota_tip_beginner_17"			"It is often a good idea to carry a Town Portal Scroll."
		"dota_tip_beginner_18"			"There are many secret paths hidden in the trees, which are often called \"juke spots\". Use these to escape attacks, or to set up an ambush."
		"dota_tip_beginner_19"			"Use Dust of Appearance to reveal nearby invisible enemies."
		"dota_tip_beginner_20"			"One rune will appear in the river every two minutes, either north of the middle lane or to the south. Both Runes will spawn from 40 minutes onward."
		"dota_tip_beginner_21"			"If you have a Bottle, picking up a Rune will store it for later use. Storing a Rune will also refill the Bottle."
		"dota_tip_beginner_22"			"You can select from many player-created Builds for your Hero by using the Build Guide button on the left side of the Top Bar."
		"dota_tip_beginner_25"			"Check your minimap often! You may discover that you are about to be ambushed."
		"dota_tip_beginner_26"			"Often the best way to learn a Hero's weaknesses is to play a match as them."
		"dota_tip_beginner_28"			"Destroying the enemy's barracks will strengthen your team's creeps in that lane."
		"dota_tip_beginner_29"			"Towers can see and attack invisible units."
		"dota_tip_beginner_31"			"Be aware of your position when attacking creeps. You may wind up pushing your team's creeps, and yourself, into a dangerous location."
		"dota_tip_beginner_32"			"The Side Shops sell many useful items, including Town Portal Scrolls and the components for many types of boots."
		"dota_tip_beginner_33"			"Several cliff tops have special marks to highlight good locations to place Observer Wards."		
		"dota_tip_beginner_36"			"Being near your team's fountain will rapidly restore your health and mana."
		"dota_tip_beginner_40"			"Strength increases maximum Health. Agility increases Attack Speed. Intelligence increases maximum Mana." 
		"dota_tip_beginner_41"			"The Secret Shop is not actually a secret." 
		"dota_tip_beginner_42"			"A \"Carry\" is a hero that gains power slowly, becoming strong late in the game. A \"Support\" hero is often most powerful early in the game, and later enhances their team's effectiveness." 
		"dota_tip_beginner_43"			"As long as your Hero is near a kill when it occurs, you will gain experience." 
		"dota_tip_beginner_44"			"You can temporarily fortify your structures and creeps, preventing all damage to them, by using the Glyph of Fortification. Use it wisely; it has a very long cooldown." 
		"dota_tip_beginner_45"			"Using Town Portal Scrolls allows you to teleport to any allied structure. Using Boots of Travel allows you to teleport to any allied unit."
		"dota_tip_beginner_46"			"If your Courier is killed, it will return, along with any items it was carrying, after 120 seconds. Flying Courier after 180 seconds."
		"dota_tip_beginner_47"			"When using a Tango, the health regeneration is always the same regardless of the size of the tree you consume." 
		"dota_tip_beginner_48"			"There are many websites and videos which can help you learn more about overall tactics, team construction, and strategies for your favorite heroes." 
 		"dota_tip_beginner_49"			"You can give a teammate one of your Tangoes by using them on that teammate."
		"dota_tip_beginner_50"			"You can use Healing Salves and Clarities on your teammates. Share the love!"		
		"dota_tip_beginner_51"			"In most modes, each player automatically earns 1 gold every 0.6 seconds, or 100 gold every minute."
		"dota_tip_beginner_52"			"Town Portal Scrolls can be given to teammates."
		"dota_tip_beginner_53"			"Observer and Sentry Wards cannot be placed inside Roshan's pit."
		"dota_tip_beginner_54"			"Unclaimed Runes will be replaced every two minutes."
		"dota_tip_beginner_55"			"Earning gold by killing creeps is often called \"Farming\"."

		
//INTERMEDIATE LOADSCREEN TIPS		(75+ games played)	
		"dota_tip_intermediate_1"			"Starting at 40 minutes, power runes will spawn at both rune spots in the river."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_2"			"Items in your backpack or stash cooldown at half the regular rate."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_3"			"After Roshan has been killed, he will respawn at a random time between 8 and 11 minutes."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_4"			"Neutral creeps spawn at the one minute mark, and then at every minute mark thereafter."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_6"			"Some spells can be dodged by using a Blink Dagger or by becoming invisible."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_8"			"Attacking from an uphill position gives you an advantage as an enemy may miss their attacks or lose you in the fog of war."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_9"			"Using a Pipe of Insight will allow you to negate spell damage from enemy Heroes."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_10"			"Assault Cuirass boosts the Armor of nearby teammates."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_11"			"When a tower is attacking you, attack-clicking on an allied creep will reset the tower's target."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_12"			"Placing a Ward or unit near a neutral creep camp can prevent the creatures in that camp from respawning at the minute mark."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_13"			"Monkey King Bar will grant you accuracy, which often prevents enemy Heroes from evading your attacks even when attacking uphill."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_14"			"Double-clicking your Blink Dagger will cause you to automatically blink toward your team's fountain."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_15"			"You can attack allied creeps that are near death. Use this to deny your enemy the gold gained from last hits."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_16"			"Magic damage can be reduced by items that grant Magical Damage Resistance."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_17"			"Physical damage can be reduced by items that grant Armor."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_18"			"Pure damage is not reduced by Armor or by Magical Damage Resistance."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_20"			"Changing the primary stat on Power Treads can break invisibility, as well as interrupt channeled spells such as using a Town Portal Scroll."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_21"			"Pulling all neutral creeps out of a camp near the minute mark will allow that camp to respawn. Use this to maximize the number of creeps you kill."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_22"			"Holding Control allows you to use your Bottle regeneration on an allied Hero. Bottled Runes, however, cannot be shared."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_23"			"Pinned in your base? You can still make purchases from the Secret Shop by sending your Courier there. Just be careful not to send it into the enemy forces!"
		"dota_tip_intermediate_24"			"When no enemy creeps are near Towers and Barracks have Backdoor Protection, which lessens the damage they take and allows them to restore their health." 
		"dota_tip_intermediate_25"			"Quelling Blade only inflicts its bonus damage on enemy and neutral creeps."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_26"			"The Damage Blocked values on a Stout Shield, Vanguard or Crimson Guard refer to the type of Hero carrying the shield, not the type of attacker."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_27"			"Dagon, Necronomicon, and Boots of Travel can be upgraded by purchasing their合成卷軸s again."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_28"			"You can give a teammate a single ward by holding Control, clicking on the ward in your inventory, then clicking on your teammate."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_29"			"Blink Dagger and Force Staff can be used to climb up and down cliff sides."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_30"			"Use a Quelling Blade or Battlefury to cut down trees and carve your own path through the forests."		
		"dota_tip_intermediate_31"			"Illusions and creeps will not dispel Smoke of Deceit, only enemy Heroes and Towers will."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_33"			"Holding Alt will display additional information in the descriptions of several abilities and items."		
		"dota_tip_intermediate_34"			"Barracks cannot reveal invisible units or wards."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_35"			"Buyback has a cooldown of 8 minutes."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_36"			"Each hero has a primary attribute of Strength, Agility, or Intelligence. Every point in your hero's primary attribute increases their attack damage by 1."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_37"			"From his second death onward, Roshan will drop Cheese in addition to the Aegis of the Immortal. Using Cheese instantly refills that hero's health by 2500 and mana by 1500."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_38"			"Hero illusions deal substantially less damage to Roshan."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_39"			"Remember to check your allies' inventories before purchasing an item for its aura effect. A teammate may already have that item, and most auras do not stack."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_41"			"Stun durations from different skills do not stack. You can keep an enemy stunned for longer with careful timing of your skills."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_42"			"Teleports from Town Portal Scrolls and Boots of Travel are not cancelled by silences or knockbacks."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_43"			"The closer a Tower is to its team's Ancient, the more gold its destruction will yield."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_45"			"Using a Soul Ring will grant you extra mana even if your mana is already full."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_46"			"You can destroy allied Towers when they are below 10% health. Denying a Tower gives no gold to the enemy for its destruction."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_47"			"You can use a Quelling Blade or Battlefury to destroy enemy observer and sentry wards; this is especially helpful for melee units to get hard to reach wards."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_49"			"Physical Damage, dealt by regular attacks, some hero abilities, and some items, can be reduced with Armor or blocked by becoming Ethereal."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_50"			"Magical Damage, dealt by most hero abilities and items, can be reduced with Magical Damage Resistance or blocked by Spell Immunity."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_51"			"Activating Manta Style will move you from your original position when the illusions appear. Use this to confuse enemies!"
		"dota_tip_intermediate_52"			"Denied creeps grant 25% of their normal experience - to both teams."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_53"			"Use the Flying Courier's Shield wisely. It has a very long cooldown."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_54"			"Ranged heroes and units have a 25% chance to miss when attacking uphill."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_55"			"Roshan becomes stronger every minute, gaining additional health, damage, and armor."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_56"			"Bounty Runes provide gold to the entire team regardless of which hero picks them up."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_57"			"Some abilities cannot be blocked by spell immunity. Each ability's interaction with spell immunity is shown in its description."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_58"			"Consider saving gold for Buyback. A well-timed Buyback can turn a desperate defense into a swift turnaround."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_59"			"Illusions deal 60% less damage to enemy structures."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_60"			"Farming in the jungle can be dangerous! You may want to buy and place a few wards to prevent enemy attempts to ambush you."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_61"			"Each hero reaches their maximum effectiveness at a different time in the match."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_62"			"If all enemy heroes have vanished from the minimap, they may be trying to slay Roshan, or setting up an ambush."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_63"			"Try setting wards near the next objective your team wishes to attack."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_64"			"Learning to play as a Support will make you a better Carry player. Learning to play as a Carry will make you a better Support player."
		"dota_tip_intermediate_65"			"Scan won't reveal enemy heroes fully inside Roshan's pit, but can reveal enemy heroes around it."

	
//ADVANCED LOADSCREEN TIPS		(150+ games played)
		"dota_tip_advanced_1"				"Reliable Gold is earned from killing Heroes. All other earnings are Unreliable Gold, which can be lost upon death."
		"dota_tip_advanced_2"				"You can use Presence Resonator to search for nearby enemies. However bear in mind doing so would also reveal your hero to your enemies.."
		"dota_tip_advanced_3"				"Shard of Anti-Magic and Shard of Replenishment cannot be shared nor be dropped."
		"dota_tip_advanced_4"				"Use Control Groups to bind and allow easier access to your Masters."		
		"dota_tip_advanced_5"				"If you are about to die, use your Command Spells or Intervention to stay alive!"
		"dota_tip_advanced_6"				"Rebellious Intent, when toggled on, will rapidly grant bonus strength and health equal to the amount of strength gained. Toggling it off and on can allow you to survive what would otherwise be fatal."
		"dota_tip_advanced_7"				"Damage dealt from Gae Buidhe prevents the victim from recovering that much health, effectively reducing their maximum health. This effect is removed at the end of round or if Diarmuid is killed."
		"dota_tip_advanced_8"				"When attacking with a Desolator, even the first attack will benefit from reduced armor on the target."
		"dota_tip_advanced_9"				"Activating Manta Style removes many debuffs, and will cause projectiles that are already in flight to miss."
		"dota_tip_advanced_10"				"After using Buyback, 25% of a hero's remaining respawn time at the time of Buyback is added to their next death."
		"dota_tip_advanced_11"				"Cheese and the Refresher Shard can both be sold for 500 gold."
		"dota_tip_advanced_17"				"If you are within range of several auras with the same effect, only the most powerful aura will be active."
		"dota_tip_advanced_18"				"If you know you are about to die, consider entering a neutral creep camp, or going to Roshan, and letting them kill you instead. This will deny the enemy team the gold and experience earned from your death."
		"dota_tip_advanced_19"				"Melee Barracks regenerate 5 hit points per second. Ranged Barracks do not regenerate."
		"dota_tip_advanced_20"				"One point of Agility increases hero attack speed by 1, armor by 0.14 and move speed by 0.05%."
		"dota_tip_advanced_21"				"One point of Intelligence adds 12 maximum mana, 1.8% mana regeneration, and spell damage is increased by 1% for every 15 points"
		"dota_tip_advanced_22"				"One point of Strength adds 18 maximum health, as well as 0.55% health regeneration and 1% magic resistance for every 13 points."
		"dota_tip_advanced_23"				"Shadow Blade can still be activated while channeling a Town Portal Scroll, or any channeling spell."
		"dota_tip_advanced_24"				"Switching Power Treads to Agility while healing allows your health and mana to restore slightly faster. Just don't forget to switch them back!"
		"dota_tip_advanced_25"				"The Aegis of the Immortal can be attacked and denied."
		"dota_tip_advanced_26"				"Illusions grant shared auras from their original hero to nearby units."
		"dota_tip_advanced_28"				"You do not need to destroy the enemy team's barracks to damage the towers near their Ancient. Destroying barracks is optional."
		"dota_tip_advanced_29"				"Warriors summoned by using a Level 3 Necronomicon have True Sight."
		"dota_tip_advanced_30"				"The effects of Dust of Appearance can be purged."
		"dota_tip_advanced_31"				"Runes can be attacked and denied."
		"dota_tip_advanced_32"				"Cleave damage is physical damage that is not mitigated by armor."
		"dota_tip_advanced_33"				"Tier 1 towers do not have backdoor protection."
		"dota_tip_advanced_34"				"Tier 2 towers' backdoor protection is disabled if an enemy creep is nearby. Each Tier 2 tower's backdoor protection is independent of the others."
		"dota_tip_advanced_35"				"All Tier 3 and 4 towers, Barracks, and the Ancient share their backdoor protection which is disabled when an enemy creep is near any part of the base."
		"dota_tip_advanced_36"				"Backdoor protection continues to be disabled for a short time even after all enemy creeps have left the area."
		"dota_tip_advanced_37"				"Blademail returns the same damage type as was received."
		"dota_tip_advanced_38"				"Blademail returned damage always pierces spell immunity."
		"dota_tip_advanced_39"				"Eye of Skadi pierces Spell Immunity and cannot be dispelled."
		"dota_tip_advanced_40"				"Remember to always carry a Town Portal Scroll."

		"dota_tip_hero_juggernaut_3"		"Sasaki Kojiro is one of the least mobile assassin. Use this fact to your advantage."

		//====================================
		// Fate System Message
		//====================================

		"Fate_Choose_Hero_Alert_60"		"Choose your heroic spirit. The game will start in 60 seconds."
		"Fate_Choose_Hero_Alert_30_1"	"The game will start in 30 seconds. Anyone who haven't picked hero by then will be assigned a random hero."
		"Fate_Choose_Hero_Alert_30_2"	"Forced random is disbled for the time being, but please decide on your pick as soon as possible before 60 seconds mark."
		"Fate_Game_Begin"	"The game has begun!"

		"Fate_Presence_Alert"	"1 minute has passed. Servants can now detect the presence of another within 2500 radius."
		"Fate_Timer_30_Alert"	"30 seconds remaining!"
		"Fate_Timer_10_Alert"	"10 seconds remaining!"
